section.title:
inventory history
by planner code Inventory History by Planner Code
section.para: To view Inventory history by Planner Code, select the "Inventory History by Planner Code" option. The following screen will appear:

tip.para: If a line displays in orange, this means the Item Site in question is frozen. Accurate Quantity on Hand information will not be shown until the Item Site is thawed.

section.para: When displaying Inventory history by Planner Code, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display Inventory history for all Planner Codes.
Specify Planner Code whose Inventory history you want to display.
Enter a Planner Code pattern to select a range of Planner Codes. Refine your search using Regular Expressions.
Select to display Inventory history by Planner Code for all Sites.
Specify Site whose Inventory history by Planner Code you want to display.
